author: gfukushima
content: question to EL clients, is there any clients that support a PoS genesis block? In case the answer is no, are there any plans to support that?

author: ajsutton
content: What do you mean a PoS genesis block?  Besu can start from a merged genesis and I think most if not all ELs can now.

author: gfukushima
content: My understanding is that we currently start from a PoW genesis block for some testnets which has a minimal difficulty but non zero difficulty (0x1), TTD being used as 0 would mean that this block triggers the PoS consensus mechanism and block 1 will be now validated using the PoS mechanisms, is that correct?

author: ajsutton
content: ah right, yes I think besu currently needs the genesis block to have a non-zero difficulty (though I don't know why).  I'm not sure about other clients. As far as the CL layer is concerned that's still a PoS block and it's payload can be embedded in the CL genesis.
